definition: horse's hoof/horseshoe/Chinese water chestnut (Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta)
lit. the horse loses its front hooves/fig. sudden failure through miscalculation or inattentiveness
Artiodactyla (even-toed ungulates, such as pigs, cows, giraffes etc)
lit. just as humans make mistakes, so can a horse stumble (idiom)/fig. everyone makes mistakes/even the best fall down sometimes
pinyin: ren2 you3 shi1 shou3 , ma3 you3 shi1 ti2

definition: Artiodactyla (even-toed ungulates, such as pigs, cows, giraffes etc)

sentences.english: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的脚快如母鹿的蹄，又使我在高处安稳。

sentences.english: Keep the horse's head up and still to make your farrier's work easier.
sentences.chinese: 让马抬着头并且静止能使蹄铁匠的工作更加容易。

sentences.english: He will make my feet like deer's feet, and He will make me walk on my high hills.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的脚快如母鹿的蹄，又使我稳行在高处。

sentences.english: After the completion of the turn, the horse is brought back to the track in a forward sideward manner before the second halt.
sentences.chinese: 在完成回旋之后，将马往侧前方带回到蹄迹线才立定。

sentences.english: Itwould be extremely unlikely that the camel would lay down with just its rearhooves on the track.
sentences.chinese: 骆驼不可能仅用后蹄就可以躺下来。

sentences.english: A man who shoes horses is called a farrier.
sentences.chinese: 为马钉蹄铁的人叫做蹄铁匠。

sentences.english: When a horse trots exactly what is he doing with his legs and feet?
sentences.chinese: 当一匹马快步时，它的腿和蹄如何运动是正确的呢？

sentences.english: But what was it the farrier asked me?
sentences.chinese: 可是蹄铁匠问我什么来着？

sentences.english: Nails are the primate equivalent of hooves and claws on other animals.
sentences.chinese: 灵长类动物的指甲相当于其它动物的蹄爪。

sentences.english: A little earth from the bank crumbled off under his horse's hind hoofs.
sentences.chinese: 一片片尘土从那匹马的后蹄踩过的路堤上塌落下来。

sentences.english: That night, I cooked a big "pig-knuckle soup".
sentences.chinese: 晚上，我煮了一大锅蹄花汤。

sentences.english: Waiting is the hoofs of time.
Both hoofs were out of shape.
He dismounts the horse whose hoofs has trampled on my little cymbidium and turns to me.
sentences.chinese: 他下了马，就是那匹马，它的蹄践踏了我的小兰花。

sentences.english: Wolves depend on a variety of large ungulates (hoofed animals) for food.
sentences.chinese: 狼每年吃大量的蹄类动物。

sentences.english: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of beast shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.
sentences.chinese: 人的脚，兽的蹄都不经过，四十年之久并无人居住。

definition: horse's hoof/horseshoe/Chinese water chestnut (Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta)
